item.title: CVE-2024-30545|2024-04-15T07:47:39.635Z -- Nick Powers -- Social Author Bio
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Nick Powers Social Author Bio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Social Author Bio: from n/a through 2.4.
